body: Your bond with the alien denizens of the Dark Tapestry allows you to see in even the deepest darkness. You gain darkvision 60 feet. At 11th level, you can see perfectly in darkness of any kind, even in absolute darkness or the darkness created by a deeper darkness spell.
name: Pierce the Veil
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Oracle/Mysteries/Dark Tapestry/Revelations/Pierce the Veil
